description: A button based label for placing inside `TableCell` for column sorting.
propActive: If `true`, the label will have the active styling (should be true for the sorted column).
propChildren: Label contents, the arrow will be appended automatically.
propClasses: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
propHideSortIcon: Hide sort icon when active is false.
stylesRoot: Styles applied to the root element.
stylesActive: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `active={true}`.
stylesIcon: Styles applied to the icon component.
stylesIconDirectionDesc: Styles applied to the icon component if `direction="desc"`.
stylesIconDirectionAsc: Styles applied to the icon component if `direction="asc"`.
